fields.name: ExpectedStatusCodeRanges
fields.description: List of expected status code ranges.

fields.name: IntervalInSeconds
fields.description: The monitor interval for endpoints in this profile. This is the interval at which Traffic Manager will check the health of each endpoint in this profile.

fields.name: Path
fields.description: The path relative to the endpoint domain name used to probe for endpoint health.

fields.name: Port
fields.description: The TCP port used to probe for endpoint health.

fields.name: ProfileMonitorStatus
fields.description: The profile-level monitoring status of the Traffic Manager profile.

fields.name: Protocol
fields.description: The protocol (HTTP, HTTPS or TCP) used to probe for endpoint health.

fields.name: TimeoutInSeconds
fields.description: The monitor timeout for endpoints in this profile. This is the time that Traffic Manager allows endpoints in this profile to response to the health check.

fields.name: ToleratedNumberOfFailures
fields.description: The number of consecutive failed health check that Traffic Manager tolerates before declaring an endpoint in this profile Degraded after the next failed health check.
